ship.name: Barbarian Slaver
ship.description:
As any anthropologist safely residing in one of the inner worlds will tell you, Barbarian cruisers are a fascinating mixture of technologies - steel or even iron frames riveted by hand by slaves with 19th century technology on which engines, shields and weapons scavenged from civilized ships are fitted by a few qualified technicians from more advanced races.
The results are bulky, ill-designed ships far from the sleek ships of modern navies. But in the border worlds of the Terran and Merseian empires, those ships can often over-power limited local defenses and leave with their holds full of loots and slaves.
